public class SocialNetworkSendThread
extends java.lang.Thread

Thread to be used when sending information to OSN in the background.

SocialNetworkSendThread

                               oracle.adf.view.rich.context.AdfFacesContext adffacescontext,

Social Network Send thread constructor.

Parameters:
context - Context
sessionId - session Id
sessionCookie - sessionCookie
adffacescontext - Adffacescontext
pageFlowBean - The page flow bean for social network.
socialNetworkDC - the data control to do the send with.
sendAction - the SocialNetworkSendThread.RUN_* constant defining which method to be called to send data to OSN.
Method Detail

run

public void run()
This method is used to run the send to OSN. The forked out thread calls the send to OSN el expression to run.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

run in class java.lang.Thread
